did.unittitle: Diary of Louis John Frederick Jaeger, 1875-1892

accessrestrict.p: Restricted; patrons use photocopy or microfilm 186 due to fragile condition of originals.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Diary of Louis John Frederick Jaeger (AZ 134). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Leonard Molina, 1957.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Ferryman and adventurer; operated ferry across Colorado River at Yuma, Ariz., 1850-1877.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Two holograph notebooks cover Mar. 1, 1875-Apr. 7, 1880, and Feb. 11 to Mar. 25, 1892; personal entries relate weather conditions, work accomplished, money owed or paid, and daily events. Accompanied by 500 page transcript and photocopy.

relatedmaterial.p: Related materials at AZ 133, AZ 135, AZ 136, AZ 528.
